```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
```

```{r}
empleo_tsbl <- us_employment |> 
  filter(year(Month) >= 1990, Title == 'Retail Trade') |> 
  select(-Series_ID)
```

## Descomposici칩n Cl치sica

```{r}
empleo_decomp <- empleo_tsbl |> 
  model(
    clasica = classical_decomposition(Employed, 
                                      type = "additive")
  )
```

### Componentes

```{r}
empleo_components <- empleo_decomp |> 
  components()

empleo_components
```
### Gr치ficas
